Brief:

Heardle is a music-based game designed to test your song recognition skills. With gameplay inspired by the classic concept of hearing a few seconds of a track and identifying it amidst a sea of melodies, Heardle stands as a delightful challenge for music lovers and trivia enthusiasts alike.

Core Features:

  • Song Snippets - Listen to short clips and guess the song. üé∂
  • Wide Music Range - Enjoy snippets from various genres and eras. üï∞Ô∏è
  • Daily Challenges - A new puzzle every day to keep your brain active. üß†
  • Shareable Scores - Flaunt your music knowledge on social media. üöÄ
  • Minimalist Interface - Easy to navigate and aesthetically delightful. üé®

  • Engaging Gameplay - Perfect for quick mental pick-me-ups. üëç
  • Discover New Music - Exposure to tracks you may not know. üåç
  • Social Interaction - Compete with friends and share experiences. üë•

Cons:
